result.title: Arch Capital: Buybacks Take Focus Over Growth
result.text: Arch Capital Group has underperformed but maintains strong fundamentals and disciplined capital allocation amid a challenging underwriting environment. ACGL's Q3 results were boosted by low catastrophe losses and favorable prior-year developments, though underlying profitability has softened slightly. Management is prioritizing share buybacks over growth, reflecting limited opportunities and prudent capital return as margins narrow.

result.title: Arch Global Services India Opens New Office in Trivandrum to Drive Innovation
result.text: TRIVANDRUM, India--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Arch Global Services India today announced the grand opening of its new office in Trivandrum's Technopark. Home to nearly 350 employees, the 26,000-square-foot space  with the potential to expand by an additional 17,000 square feet  reinforces Arch Global Services India's commitment to establishing a long-term presence in India. Arch Global Services India is a wholly owned subsidiary of Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ: ACGL), a global provider of insurance,.

result.title: Arch Global Services India Opens Technology Hub in Hyderabad to Accelerate Innovation
result.text: HYDERABAD, India--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Arch Global Services India, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ: ACGL)  a global provider of insurance, reinsurance and mortgage insurance and member of the S&P 500  today announced the grand opening of its new office in Hyderabad. The office, which will be home to approximately 100 employees with room to expand in the future, is focused on delivering innovative and technology-driven services across Arch Capital Group's affiliate.

result.title: Arch Capital Group Ltd. to Report 2025 Third Quarter Results on October 27
result.text: PEMBROKE, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ: ACGL) (Arch or the Company) today announced it expects to release its 2025 third quarter results after the close of regular stock market hours on Monday, Oct. 27. The Company will hold a conference call for investors and analysts at 10 a.m. ET on Tuesday, Oct. 28.
